verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah<s%>. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> this, all ye <S%H5971>people<s%>; give <S%H238>ear<s%>, all ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2465>world<s%>: for: or, of
Both <S%H1121>low<s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H1121>high<s%> <S%H376><s%>, <S%H6223>rich<s%> and <S%H34>poor<s%>, <S%H3162>together<s%>.
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> of <S%H2454>wisdom<s%>; and the <S%H1900>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be of <S%H8394>understanding<s%>.
I will <S%H5186>incline<s%> mine <S%H241>ear<s%> to a <S%H4912>parable<s%>: I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my dark <S%H2420>saying<s%> upon the <S%H3658>harp<s%>.
Wherefore should I <S%H3372>fear<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>, when the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H6120>heels<s%> shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> me about?
They that <S%H982>trust<s%> in their <S%H2428>wealth<s%>, and <S%H1984>boast<s%> themselves in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6239>riches<s%>;
None of them <S%H376>can<s%> by any <S%H6299>means<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>, nor <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for him:
(For the <S%H6306>redemption<s%> of their <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H3365>precious<s%>, and it <S%H2308>ceaseth<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>:)
That he should still <S%H2421>live<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>, and not <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7845>corruption<s%>.

For he <S%H7200>seeth<s%> that wise <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H3162>likewise<s%> the <S%H3684>fool<s%> and the brutish <S%H1198>person<s%> <S%H6>perish<s%>, and <S%H5800>leave<s%> their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> to <S%H312>others<s%>.

Their <S%H7130>inward<s%> thought is, that their <S%H1004>houses<s%> shall continue for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and their <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> places to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>; they <S%H7121>call<s%> their <S%H127>lands<s%> after their own <S%H8034>names<s%>. all: Heb. generation and generation
Nevertheless <S%H120>man<s%> being in <S%H3366>honour<s%> <S%H3885>abideth<s%> not: he is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish<s%>.
This their <S%H1870>way<s%> is their <S%H3689>folly<s%>: yet their <S%H310>posterity<s%> <S%H7521>approve<s%> their <S%H6310>sayings<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. approve: Heb. delight in their mouth

Like <S%H6629>sheep<s%> they are <S%H8371>laid<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave<s%>; <S%H4194>death<s%> shall <S%H7462>feed<s%> on them; and the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall have <S%H7287>dominion<s%> over them in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; and their <S%H6697>beauty<s%> <S%H6736><s%> shall <S%H1086>consume<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave<s%> from their <S%H2073>dwelling<s%>. beauty: or, strength in the grave from: or, the grave being an habitation to every one of them

But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H7585>grave<s%>: for he shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> me. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. power: Heb. hand the grave: or, hell
Be not thou <S%H3372>afraid<s%> when <S%H376>one<s%> is made <S%H6238>rich<s%>, when the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H7235>increased<s%>;
For when he <S%H4194>dieth<s%> he shall carry nothing <S%H3947>away<s%>: his <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall not <S%H3381>descend<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.
Though while he <S%H2416>lived<s%> he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%>: and men will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, when thou doest <S%H3190>well<s%> to thyself. while: Heb. in his life
He shall <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers<s%>; they shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>. He: Heb. The soul shall
<S%H120>Man<s%> that is in <S%H3366>honour<s%>, and <S%H995>understandeth<s%> not, is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish<s%>.
